name: Quad Ball
description:
Quad Ball is a four-player simultaneous action/sport shooter. Use the controls to rotate your ship and rocket forward. Fire the blasters to shoot the ball into another player's goal and defend your goal! The first player to reach 0 points loses the match. Press "Enter" to restart after a match.

You can press your "Down" button to remind yourself which goal is yours.

This game is also available as a ".lutro" file for the LibRetro core.

Controls

Player West: Up, Left, Down, Right, R_Ctrl

Player South: W, A, S, D, L_Ctrl

Player East: I, J, K, L, Spacebar

Player North: Numpad_8, Numpad_4, Numpad_5, Numpad_6, Numpad_0
